text: Aakash Dabhade (born March 8, 1985 in Nagpur, Maharashtra, India) is an Indian actor working in the Indian film industry. He is known as a versatile actor with great comic timing, expressions and dancing skills. He gained popularity for his portrayal of 'Mohan' in the movie Ferrari Ki Sawaari produced by Vidhu Vinod Chopra and directed by Rajesh Mhapuskar. He came to limelight for his movie Boss with Akshay Kumar. Hindi film Stree gave him the recognition as a very good expressive dancer.Critically acclaimed Film Article 15 (film) starring Ayushmann Khurrana and Directed By Anubhav Sinha gave him recognition as an Intense actor. His TV commercials with actors Imran Khan, Irrfan Khan, Vidya Balan and with brands such as Car Dekho, Nokia, Pidilite LW plus, Bingo wafers became very popular. ==Filmography== {| class="wikitable" |+Key | style="background:#FFFFCC;"| | Denotes films that have not yet been released |} {| class="wikitable sortable plainrowheaders" |- style="text-align:center;" ! scope="col"|Year ! scope="col"|Film ! scope="col"|Role ! class="unsortable" scope="col"|Notes |- | 2009 !scope="row"|3 idiots | Engineering student | directed by Rajkumar Hirani |- | 2012 !scope="row"|Ferrari Ki Sawaari | Mohan | produced by Vidhu Vinod Chopra |- |2013 !scope="row"|Boss |Vishal Pradhan | |- |2015 !scope="row"|Bangistan | Sanichara | directed by Karan Anshuman |- |2016 !scope="row"|7 Hours to Go |Inspector Ghorpade | directed by Saurabh Varma |- |2016 !scope="row"|Shivaay |Indian Trekker |directed by Ajay Devgn |- |2018 !scope="row"|Baa Baaa Black Sheep |Fixer | distributed by T-Series |- |2018 !scope"row"|Stree |Narendra |with Rajkumar Rao |- |2019 !scope"row"|Article 15 |Satyendra | directed by Anubhav Sinha |- |2020 !scope"row"|Babloo Bachelor |Chhotte | |- |2020 !scope"row"|Kya Masti Kya Dhoom |Dara |directed by Chandrakant Singh |- |2019 !scope"row"|Housefull 4 |Harry's Friend | |- |2019 !scope"row"|Penalty |Jugaadu aka Chandan | |- |2020 !scope"row"|Shukranu |Bhaanu |on Zee5 |- |2020 !scope"row"|Mastram |Gopal |MX Player Web series |- |2020 !scope"row"|Lootcase |Graduate |Disney+ Hotstar film |- |} ==References== ==External links== * Category:1985 births Category:Indian male film actors Category:Living people Category:People from Maharashtra Category:Indian male actors Category:21st-century Indian actors
